description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Space Wars is a real-time strategy game where you race your mother ships to the centre of the star system while capturing planets to spawn more fighter ships and attacking enemy mother ships to push them back.
description.short: Space Wars is a real-time strategy game where you race your mother ships to the centre of the star system while capturing planets to spawn more fighter ships and attacking enemy mother ships to push them back.
